SourceProxy.label: VESPA Mesh Smoothing
SourceProxy.name: VESPAMeshSmoothing

Documentation.short_help: Smoothes the shape of a triangulated vtkPolyData.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter moves vertices to optimize geometry around each vertex: it can try to (1) equalize the angles between incident edges, or (and) move vertices so that areas of adjacent triangles tend to equalize (angle and area smoothing), or (2) moves vertices following an area-based Laplacian smoothing scheme, performed at each vertex in an estimated tangent plane to the surface (tangential relaxation). Border vertices are considered constrained and do not move at any step of the procedure. No vertices are inserted at any time.

IntVectorProperty.name: SmoothingMethod
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which method will be used to smooth the mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Number Of Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of iterations for the smoothing algorithm.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSafetyConstraints
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Safety Constraints
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If false (default), all moves will be allowed.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseUpdateAttributes
IntVectorProperty.label: Copy attributes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If ON, attributes will be copied unto the resulting mesh.
